This is a testharness.js-based test.
PASS Test that a change event is fired when the page is visible. 
PASS Test that change event is not fired when the page is not visible. 
PASS Test that screen.orientation keeps returning the same orientation when the page is not visible. 
PASS Test that screen.orientation is updated once the page is visible again. 
PASS Test that the iframe got as many events as the main frame. 
Harness: the test ran to completion.
